entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
